sentence.Network_en: Claire looked longingly at the sunlit gardens outside the window.
sentence.Network_cn: 克莱尔望着窗外洒满阳光的花园，内心充满渴望。

sentence.Network_en: He looked longingly at the food on the table.
sentence.Network_cn: 他眼巴巴地盯着桌上的食物.

sentence.Network_en: Over drinks , he speaks longingly of his trip to Latin America.
sentence.Network_cn: 他带着留恋的心情, 一边喝酒一边叙述他的拉丁美洲之行.

but as I sat round with the men and women now together -- all in jeans , I found them looking longingly at my old photos from my previous visit so many years ago .但是现在当我再与这里的男男女女坐到一起的时候——所有的人都穿着牛仔裤。我发现他们正充满渴望地看着我的那些老照片，那些老照片是很多年前我来拜访时拍的。

entry.def: If you look longingly at something you want, or think longingly about it, you look at it or think about it with a feeling of desire.

example.ex: Claire looked longingly at the sunlit gardens outside the window.
example.tran: 克莱尔望着窗外洒满阳光的花园，内心充满渴望。

sentences.sentence: "he spent the rest of the act gazing longingly over my right shoulder at the illuminated word `Exit'"

auth_sentence.content: While looking longingly into the distant present, by way of my rose colored shades.
